parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of power steering functionality can cause the vehicle to be difficult to control, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle jerks
loss of power steering functionality
audible warning
power steering warning light illuminates
steering wheel becomes drastically difficult to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The incorrect repair of a recalled vehicle can lead to continued safety risks and potential accidents.
symptoms: Dealer states that the vehicle should not have been included in the recall repair
despite receiving notification of the recall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the internal water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to damage to the engine and potentially causing a breakdown or accident.
symptoms: The temperature gauge spikes to hot
the vehicle smells strongly of coolant
coolant leaks from the water pump
the engine overheats.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature valve cover leaking can cause the spark plugs to become soaked, leading to engine misfires, stalling, and decreased performance, which can increase the risk of an accident.
symptoms: The engine stutters on soft acceleration
the engine stutters when pulling out or increasing velocity
the engine stutters when going up hills or on upgrades.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent wiper defect can reduce visibility while driving, increasing the risk of an accident.
symptoms: The wipers malfunction
the wipers do not turn on
the wipers turn on intermittently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine overheating can cause damage to the engine and potentially lead to a breakdown or accident.
symptoms: The temperature gauge rises to hot
the engine overheats
the vehicle loses power
the vehicle stalls.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loud popping and cracking noise from the speakers can be a distraction to the driver, potentially leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Loud popping and cracking noise coming from the speakers
even when the audio is powered off
occurring randomly
more frequently in the evening or night time
both when the car is stationary and in motion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the keyless ignition system to engage the parking brake or put the car into park can cause the vehicle to roll or coast, potentially leading to accidents, property damage, or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls or coasts after the keyless ignition button is pushed
even when the car is not in park
resulting in accidents or near-misses.
